original_text: It was still difficult to sail, so we sailed near to the coast. Then we arrived at a place called ‘Safe Port’. This port was near to the town of Lasea.
korean_text: 간신히 그 연안을 지나 미항이라는 곳에 이르니 라새아 시에서 가깝더라

sentences.original_text: It was still difficult to sail
so we sailed near to the coast
Then we arrived at a place
This port was near to the town of Lasea
sentences.korean_translation: 이 항구는 라세아라는 마을 근처에 있었습니다
